Professor Hamilton recently wrote: Debt ceiling politics If you have a concrete proposal to raise tax revenue or cut spending, then put it on the table. But if you simply want to grandstand on the debt ceiling as if it were a stand-alone issue, it is clear that you have nothing but contempt for the voters. â¢ A recent article on NY Times about" discussions" on state bankruptcies.
